datafield.subfield: Ghost-Fields, BRS and Extended Supergravity as Applications of Gauge Geometry

We view the methods of gauge Geometry, including the sequence Lie group/Fiber Bundle/Gauge Manifold. We derive the Ghost fields and BRS transformations geometricallz (and classically), showing that the Ghost fields and nothing but vertical components of the gauge-potential one-forms. We state theorem of Spontaneous Fibration of a Weakly-Reducible and Symmetric Group Manifold and apply the method to the derivation of Extended Supergravity (Chiral or Parity-conserving) for any N.
In *Tokyo 1978, Proceedings, 19th International Conference On High Energy Physics*, Tokyo 1979
